case 9154: if(!inJail()) { logout(); } else { sendMessage("You cannot log out while in jail!"); } break;

item.title: Attention!
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

[quote=“XXwolfXX, post:1, topic:272830”]Okay, how do i make it so when i jail people they can’t log out!?
heres the code

		  } if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
if(teleblock == true){

sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by cody
}
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2775;
c.teleportToY = 2796;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it, faget.”);
c.teleblock = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" HAS JUST FUCKING JAILED " + command.substring(5);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;[/quote]
Logout=false

Read full topic

if(teleblock == true){
